response.original_title: Chalino Sanchez: Una vida de peligros
response.overview: Documentary - Known as the original "sad corridor," Mexican singer Chalino Sanchez masterfully combined heart-tugging melodies with sad stories. Sanchez, killed in 1992 after a performance, is memorialized by loved ones and fans in this look at a true talent missed by many. The tribute features Sanchez's final interview, plus interviews with his wife, sister and children. Graciela Beltran, Humberto Luna and Chalino's band, Los Amables del Norte, also appear. -  Adan Sanchez, Juana Sanchez, Marisela Sanchez
response.title: Chalino Sanchez: Una vida de peligros
